#summary Contact Me
=Contact Me=

Bug reports and feature requests can be made by opening a ticket on Potato's [http://code.google.com/p/potatomushclient/issues/list Google Code Issue Tracker] - please check for a similar issue first! You can also email me (Mike Griffiths) directly at talvo-at-talvo-dot-com. All contributions will be fully credited.

If you're reporting a bug, please include the version of Potato, your operating system, and anything else you think is relevant.

Potato is completely free, but if you've found it useful and would like to make a donation towards its development, you can do so at [http://www.potatomushclient.com www.potatomushclient.com]. (Thank you!)
